mutants.original_line: full_schedule_query = "INSERT INTO full_schedule (event_id, event_name, date, time, location) VALUES (1, 'Event 1', '2022-01-01', '09:00', 'Conference Room A'), (2, 'Event 2', '2022-01-02', '14:00', 'Auditorium B');"

schedule_info_query = "INSERT INTO schedule_info (event_id, description, participants) VALUES (1, 'Description for Event 1', 'Speaker A, Attendee X'), (2, 'Description for Event 2', 'Panelists: Y, Z');"
